top_comments.comment: Why isn't Bannon indicted yet? Are you people too afraid, just don't care or you have too much money. This is all a bunch of hogwash I'm beginning to think that's total Washington DC inflation you childish little kids make me sick

comments_since_last_sample.body: It’s just beyond frustrating,aren’t they really interested in holding anyone accountable for these heinous crimes against the American people??!! My God, if it was me I’d have been thrown in jail and threw away the keys!! It’s like this AG doesn’t want to do anything like he’s scared or something, well if that’s the case, then just quit and give YOU the job, I’m sure you’ll do what’s needed!! Jesus Christ man, these people are killing me with this procrastination shit!!!!!
Garland won’t do shit! Might as well have Barr stay on the job.
So today, November 2, we are still waiting?

Wasn't it Obama who nominated Garland for the Supreme Court. it is a club and they will protect each other.The DOJ has always been as useless as the FBI. It is just so obvious that everyone can see it whether you are a D or a R or an I.
